titleStmt.title: A sermon profitably preached in the church within her Maiesties honourable Tower, neere the citie of London ...
titleStmt.author: Anderson, Anthony, d. 1593.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, and are to be solde at the signe of the white Horse in Cannon lane ..,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at the Tower.
Title page faded and some pages stained, affecting print.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the white Horse in Cannon lane ..
